newsitem.title: USA: IPO PRICING - PSW Tech within range at $9.
newsitem.headline: IPO PRICING - PSW Tech within range at $9.

text.p: Lead Underwriter Alex. Brown & Sons Inc

NOTE: The company said that in addition to the 2.85 million shares offered, it has also granted the underwriters an option to purchase up to an additional 427,500 shares of common stock to cover over-allotments, if any.

The company said the anticipated net proceeds from the offering will be used to repay indebtedness, to pay certain corporate income tax obligations, to pay dividends to existing stockholders in amounts estimated to approximate certain of their 1997 income tax obligations and for working capital and other general corporate purposes.
PSW Technologies is a software services firm that provides solutions to technology vendors and business-end users by mastering and applying critical emerging technologies.
